overview: A secret agent sets out to stop an evil scientist who is about to unleash on the world a virulent biological strain he has developed during experiments on rats.

production_companies.name: P.A.C., Compagnie Industrielle et Commerciale Cinématographique (CICC)

tagline: Many men have come to the intrigue-ridden far east to steal his secret. No man has lived to touch it!
title: OSS 117: Panic in Bangkok
